modName: Dagi and Co - Mounts and Followers
summary: With this mod you can summon 17 helmeted (and armored) Dagis + 3 Goblins + 2 Scamps + 1 Bone Falmer Mounts and (-simple-) Followers wherever you want; and you can also find 5 Companions (2 Goblins, 2 Scamps, 1 Bone Falmer) in Falkreath (just near the Deadwood Lumber Mill).DLC Dragonborn Needed.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]Dagi and Co. Mounts and Followers [/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b]version 1.7[/b] [/color] allow you to summon 17 helmeted (and armored) Dagis + 3 Goblins + 2 Scamps + 1 Bone Falmer Mounts and (-simple-) Followers wherever you want; and you can also find 5 Companions (2 Goblins, 2 Scamps, 1 Bone Falmer) in Falkreath (Inside, just near the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Deadwood_Lumber_Mill ]Deadwood Lumber Mill[/url]/Sawmill).

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Dagi"

[color=#00ff00][b]Optional file: Esp version Française pour la version 1.7[/b] [/color]


The DLC Dragonborn is required

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ZagfjVh.gif[/img]

Thanks to Vicn for his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

[url=https://www.4shared.com/photo/nnCmZxlqei/dagi-3.html][img]https://www.4shared.com/img/nnCmZxlqei/s25/16115816cb8/dagi-3[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] INSTALLATION[/b][/color] (very important)

[color=#00ff00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#00ff00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 24 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! to obtain the books (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, and the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Dagi" at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the Goblin and the Scamp)

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):


[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=https://www.4shared.com/photo/_R7bSVyoca/dagi.html][img]https://www.4shared.com/img/_R7bSVyoca/s25/16115815930/dagi[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] Bugs or Problems[/b][/color]

If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

[URL=https://www.4shared.com/photo/1GdYPXKTca/dagi-2.html][IMG]https://www.4shared.com/img/1GdYPXKTca/s25/161158164e8/dagi-2[/IMG][/URL]
